parameters.query: SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.hp, c.coins, c.level, u.username, u.email, s.overdraft_rule FROM characters c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN settings s ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE c.last_login > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
SELECT h.character_id, COUNT(*) as overdue_habits FROM habits h WHERE h.type = 'good' AND h.last_completed < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 days' GROUP BY h.character_id

SELECT t.character_id, COUNT(*) as overdue_tasks FROM (SELECT c.id as character_id FROM characters c JOIN projects p ON p.character_id = c.id JOIN tasks t ON t.project_id = p.id WHERE t.completed = false AND t.deadline < CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY c.id) as t GROUP BY t.character_id
UPDATE characters SET hp = $1 WHERE id = $2 RETURNING id, hp
INSERT INTO events (character_id, event_type, description, coins, hp, xp) VALUES ($1, 'daily_maintenance', $2, 0, $3, 0)
SELECT et.id, et.name, et.description, et.coins, et.hp, et.xp FROM event_templates et WHERE et.frequency = 'daily' AND et.active = true ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 10
INSERT INTO events (character_id, event_type, description, coins, hp, xp, event_id) VALUES ($1, 'daily_random', $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)
UPDATE habits SET streak = 0 WHERE last_completed < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 days' AND type = 'good' RETURNING id, character_id, name
INSERT INTO events (character_id, event_type, description) VALUES ($1, 'streak_broken', $2)
